name: part_015
file: tmp_【5 YEAR ANNIVERSARY】The Story Thus Far - featuring HoloEN! #5YearsOfMori [MryxToVvJO0]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_015.mov

scenes.description: Mori finds an ominous square frame on a rock wall on the beach and decides to go through it.
Mori enters the 'HOLO360 LIVE MUSIC CLUB', a recreation of a past event venue.
Mori walks backstage to a room where fans were once 'seated' during a 360-degree stream.
Mori leaves the club through another portal, heading towards Atlantis.
Mori runs across the water surface, reminiscing while heading to the next area.
Mori arrives at a sunken area resembling Atlantis, based on Gawr Gura's room.

subtitles.english: in an interesting way on this stage?

subtitles.english: And we did it in 360 too!

and like sit in the center

and like sit in the center

subtitles.english: wonderful people to enjoy and support, but...

subtitles.english: Well, we'll talk about that a little bit later, but...

subtitles.english: ...I guess we better get out of here.

and just reminisce about everything

subtitles.english: Let's go!

subtitles.english: I'm happy you're with us, Calli.

subtitles.english: I'm happy I'm here.
